video:video.video:title: Patient Testimonial: Is the Panoptix® IOL the Right Decision for My Cataracts?
video:video.video:description: Choosing the right option for your cataract surgery starts with a visit to your ophthalmologist. Listen to 68-year-old grandmother, Mary, and her experience with the PanOptix® IOL. Being able to enjoy the simple things in life again turned Mary into a true PanOptimist!

video:video.video:title: Patient Testimonial: Live Your Life with the Alcon PanOptix® Trifocal IOL
video:video.video:description: Sandy’s ophthalmologist recommended the PanOptix® IOL surgery for cataracts. Listen to her story here and find out more about her life after cataract surgery.

video:video.video:title: Patient Testimonial: Can You Restore Your Visual Confidence with the Alcon PanOptix® IOL?
video:video.video:description: Listen to ex-commercial pilot, Bill, recount his experience after cataract surgery and the vision improvements he has encountered with the PanOptix® lens. Find out more about his story here.

video:video.video:title: Patient Testimonial: Do What You Love After Cataract Surgery
video:video.video:description: Fear of going blind prompted Barbara to visit an ophthalmologist. After cataract surgery her vision was restored to 20/20! At 70, Barbara is finally able to do what she loves day in and day out. See her story here.

video:video.video:title: Patient Testimonial: Experience Life After Cataract Surgery with the PanOptix® IOL
video:video.video:description: After wearing eyeglasses for 25 years, Dale, a 67-year-old Marketing Director decided to undergo cataract surgery with the PanOptix® trifocal lens. Find out more and hear her post-surgery story today.
